directions: Stir all ingredients in small bowl to blend. Season with black pepper. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
*Lemon preserved in a lemon juice and salt brine is used most often in Moroccan cuisine. Available at some specialty foods stores.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons minced preserved lemon (peel only)* or 1 1/2 teaspoon grated lemon peel
title: Lemon and Olive Mayonnaise
